title: #96 - Hotline Edition: How to Decide to Go on Another Date with Someone You’re Not Sure About
description:
This week, we’re opening up the hotline with some extra support to help with your questions!

Joining Maria this week to help you with your online dating problems is Agape Match’s Online Dating Manager, Erika Ettin. 

Topics and questions discussed this week include…

  • How do you decide to go on another date with someone that you’re not totally into?
  • What's the line between people not really communicating and me not wasting my time?
  • It can be extremely dating to be extroverted with people that are not friends or family. It feels like I am bringing all the energy to the conversations and dates. 
  • Should I still talk to other people when I’m going on dates with people? 
  • An update on a previous caller who moved to another city! 
  • Being empowered to communicate your communication needs.
  • I keep finding men that just want something casual. How do I express what I’m really looking for?
  • I’m suffering from app fatigue. It’s becoming too much to juggle between different apps. 
  • I found out I can’t have kids. How do I tell the guy that I’m seeing?

Erika Ettin is an online dating expert and dating coach who helps people navigate the world of online dating. Her expertise includes profile creation, photo selection and photography, message writing, and date planning. She is also the author of the book Love at First Site: Tips & Tales for Online Dating Success from a Modern-Day Matchmaker and the co-host of the popular dating podcast “So, We Met Online…”

Find Erika on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/ALittleNudge/ 

Our next Online Dating Tech Support is Monday May 9th at 12PM ET. To register, go to https://agapematch.wufoo.com/forms/z1s18kn10qpwm8f/

To book a Dating Strategy call with a member of the Agape Match team to discuss your dating goals, click here: https://calendly.com/felix-louie/ie-info-30-minute-call  

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
